title: Population resettlement due to colonial borders

content.prompt: The relocation of Hindus and Sikhs from Pakistan to India and Muslims from India to Pakistan between 1945 and 1955 reflects which of the following world historical processes?

choices.label: The migration of former colonial subjects to imperial metropoles
Population resettlement caused by redrawing former colonial borders
The development of ethnic enclaves as these migrants moved for work
The seasonal migration patterns associated with temporary work

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
